archimate:Assessment.name: Aki wants ESA to set and enforce rules
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Rationale: Aki doesn't want ESA to negotiate with other parts of the organization, they are setting the rules.
Aki sees ESA as an authoritative body within the organization, one that defines and imposes security rules rather than negotiating standards and practices. This driver reflects the need for a decisive and assertive stance in setting security protocols, ensuring that there is a single source of truth for security practices that is not subject to internal debate.
